item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurants and events in Providence.

This week's location is: Viva Mexican Cantina Grill!!! - on Washington Street in the new AS220 Mercantile building.

Okay, so technically we're celebrating Cinco de Mayo a week or so early, but this is probably the best way to check out this new place before the crowds come out!

Viva Mexico opened about a year ago and offers a variety of Platillos served up in a very authentic way. The food is fresh and the atmosphere is the "spicest" of any Mexican restaurant in Providence. There is also a huge bar in the back and sidewalk patio in the quiet alleyway behind. We think you may want to go back!

So, get your Cinco de Mayo on early and let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

http://www.vivamexicocantinagrill.com/ordereze/Content/1/Summary.aspx

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Night Meetup. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: John is hosting this one! Please look at his picture!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Viva Mexico Cantina Grill!!!!!
